text: Priority consideration for the District government's facility needs shall be given to buildings fulfilling or exceeding the LEED-NC 2.2 standard or the LEED-CS 2.0 standard at the silver level. For purposes of this subsection, the terms "LEED-CS" and "LEED-NC" shall have the same meanings as provided in § 6-1451.01(28) and (30), respectively.
